Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Welcome to this monthly newsletter crafted for you to blend charm and elegance into your life with our exclusive news and events, both in Singapore and around the World!
AS A NEW MYPJ MEMBER, DISCOVER EXCEPTIONAL PRIVILEGES!
My Perrier-Jouët is a new bespoke membership program specially crafted for you in Singapore. The way to join is very simple: join us at our dinners in the best fine-dining restaurants in the city, and you will be granted access to many unique privileges and exclusive experiences.
DISCOVER THE PRIVILEGES AT A GLANCE
REWARDS
• Welcome gift • Bespoke seasonal gift • 5th Champagne dinner complimentary
EXPERIENCE
• Chefs-in-residence • Champagne Masterclass by the Brand Ambassador Marie Deloffre • Invitation to discover Maison Belle Époque tour and Perrier-Jouët cellars • Masterclasses with the cellar master Hervé Deschamps
EXCLUSIVITY
• Access to exclusive Limited Editions • Exclusive passes to Perrier-Jouët events
Find out more about the benefits of My Perrier-Jouët membership or join us now: my.perrier-jouet.com <[[my.perrier-jouet.com]]>
MASTERCLASS #1:
Champagne Perrier-Jouët and Caviar
A FANTASTIC
AFTERNOON AWAITS!
Join us for the first of our exclusive series of Masterclasses with Marie, the Perrier-Jouët Brand Ambassador! To start the season, we are delighted to present you a rare Champagne and Caviar Masterclass at 28@Wilkie on September 20. You will be able to balance your senses between 4 different cuvees of Perrier-Jouët and the delicacy of caviar and finger food, while being transported by the iconic history of our Champagne House. Register now!
Date & Time :
Wednesday 20 September,
from 5.30 pm to 7 pm
Location :
28@Wilkie - 28 Wilkie Road - 228051
Price :
S$20 NETT
SIGN UP NOW <[[http://www.mypjexperience.sg/28wilkie_masterclass.html?utm_source=aug-newsletter]]>
GLOBAL
HIGHLIGHT
REOPENING OF THE MAISON BELLE ÉPOQUE IN EPERNAY
After years of renovation, Maison Belle Époque in Epernay reopens its door revealing a world of grace, beauty and refinement!
The elegant Maison is today the living symbol, not only of Maison Perrier-Jouët’s 200-year heritage, but also of its enduring philosophy and unique vision of champagne.
It offers the privileged guests exceptional surroundings with its traditions, craftsmanship, and twin inspirations of art and nature.
DISCOVER MORE <[[http://www.perrier-jouet.com/en-ww/the-house-perrier-jouet/maison-belle-epoque-experience?utm_source=aug-newsletter]]>
